name: Sweet Dreams (Marco McGowan)
description:
A kind old man has offered to make some candy just for you, and you get to pick the ingredients! Suddenly you find yourself dreaming about a candy themed procedural dungeon.

Controls:

ESC - Access menu

WASD/Arrows - Movement

SPACE - Open chest

Credits:

Programmed by Sky Gamby-Haycock and Marco McGowan

Game Art by Lord Dredlam

Concept Art by Loxmer

Music by KawzS
